CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Company_Sector__c)="Hospitality",
Cluster_Hospitality__c ,
IF( TEXT(Company_Sector__c) = "Retail",
Cluster_Retail__c ,
IF(TEXT(Company_Sector__c)="Parking" || TEXT(Company_Sector__c)="Financial Partner",
Cluster_Parking_and_Partner__c ,
"" )))
CustomField.label: Cluster Region
